tweets.text: Landfill gases filling the house again last night. Everywhere stinks. Hubby woke up feeling dizzy. Usual reporting to Env Agency and Council. @StinkStopthe @EnvAgencyMids
@ClareDinnisEA @EnvAgencyMids Can we have the end of February‚Äôs data? Negligence or incompetence #stopthestink

Fabulous report on @itvnews about @RedIndustries2 and @WalleysL @EnvAgencyMids is it true you are not able to provide today‚Äôs report due to technical difficulties? Forgotten to turn the sensors on AGAIN? @itvnews perhaps you could ask them what tech.diffs mean?
@ClareDinnisEA @EnvAgencyMids Why can't the data be accessable in real time?

@ClareDinnisEA @EnvAgencyMids Thanks for the update are you still here? The smell has got exponentially bad in the past hour after being fine all day. My girlfriend is 39wks pregnant and we both feel sick with bad headaches - all happened in past 1hr

Things I thought I‚Äôd never tweet for the @EnvAgencyYNE ‚Ä¶.

A friend got this clip of a deer swimming and wondering round the #RiverDon in #KelhamIsland, #Sheffield.

It‚Äôs really nice to see nature so close to urban centres‚Ä¶.. it‚Äôs called @theoutdoorcity for a reason üôå https://t.co/caWjbvP2JT

On 4th March 2020 the First-teir Tribunal overruled a decision by EA & ICO not to provide Robert Latimer with data regarding the Whitburn sewage overflow.

1 year, 1 month & 26 days later he has still not received that information.

Why is that @EnvAgency, @ICOnews? https://t.co/wO5G8OTvfh

üëè üëè @EnvAgency trying to cover their üçë & cover themselves in glory for saving us (which so far hasn‚Äôt worked anyway!) . We will continue to expose them for what they‚Äôve done @Cap_it_off @StinkStopthe #stopthestink https://t.co/xynL7kSiN4

@SianieRoo @LoneRanger77777 @ClareDinnisEA @EnvAgencyMids @Cap_it_off @StinkStopthe 6am this morning. Driving through the Westlands and all the way through to the M6 jnct 15 it was horrendous. Unbearable stench.

@ClareDinnisEA @EnvAgencyMids Dr Scott is a well respected doctor if he‚Äôs saying the landfill is having an impact on our health, believe him. I have no confidence in you, @EnvAgencyMids. You‚Äôve let @RedIndustries2 get away with making hell for too long. Shame on you and #StopTheStink

@ClareDinnisEA @EnvAgencyMids @RedIndustries2 @AaronBell4NUL Why would you be really pleased to be out in Newcastle under Lyme? You should be really sorry that you and @EnvAgencyMids have let @RedIndustries2 get away with making our lives miserable. Shame on you. Do your job and #StopTheStink

@ClareDinnisEA @EnvAgencyMids @RedIndustries2 @AaronBell4NUL You make it sound like a nice day out sightseeing or a garden party not an environmental and health crisis. Put it into special measures, get someone experienced and reputable to cap it off and shut it down. Fresh air is a basic human right but to us it's a luxury.

I‚Äôve read & listened to social media, letters to me / @EnvAgencyMids & news reports so have been struck by the #mentalhealth impacts already but hearing from people f2f is always v powerful.
